com.dropbox.client2

Class SecureSSLSocketFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.http.conn.ssl.SSLSocketFactory
      • com.dropbox.client2.SecureSSLSocketFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.http.conn.scheme.LayeredSocketFactory, org.apache.http.conn.scheme.SocketFactory

    public class SecureSSLSocketFactory
extends org.apache.http.conn.ssl.SSLSocketFactory
    Includes the following security features: - Pinned trusted root certificates - Strict hostname verification - Require TLS v1.0 and above (TLS v1.2 if supported) - Fixed priority of TLS ciphersuites Currently, client-side SSL connection caching doesn't seem to be compatible with being able to set custom SSL ciphersuites. Therefore, disabling SSL connection caching.
